Annotation.note:
The paper [BIB/Wang_92b] dscribes a parallel version of procedures implemented in the author's Maple package charseries based on disk remote connected Maple sessions on a workstation cluster. Reports a speedup of 5..10 for 12 processors.
It discusses the following examples:
Gerdt-85 as Problem 3 Katsura_5 as Problem 4 Wu-90 as Problem 6 Butcher as Problem 7 Hairer_2 as Problem 8
